items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome dress for a Awesome event!!!!
items.body: This was an amazing purchase.I bought it for a wedding.It's extremely classy.Great fabric and it is also true to size. I bought a medium and the length and width was perfect.A truly nice fit.The colour was an added bonus. Read more
items.author: Kim

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good material
items.body: I like that's dress it's nice , i ordered size Large that's a true size and fit me well , it has a good quality , and has a strong material Read more
items.author: Florcie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweet dress
items.body: This was great for a high school formal event. Her dad was pleased. She could dance in it and not worry about her undergarments showing. Do not forget to steam before use to remove the wrinkles and folds. Read more
items.author: BentoMommy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a party
items.body: The dress is really pretty, perfect for a party. It was too long for me though, I am 5â€™1 but it was really pretty Read more
items.author: Melissa Castaneda

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Dress, Light and Airy
items.body: I wore this dress to a friend's wedding and I love the mint color. It's elegant and I love the bodice with the beading. The sequins are sewn on, so they don't fall off and make a mess like glitter. The fluffy tulle on the shoulders gives it extra style too. I am also happy that I can wear a bra with this since I am small chested and would look flat otherwise. The one part of the bodice is cut low, but there's some fabric going across that will hide that. The length was great (I'm 5'6") and the size small fit me well. I am 115 pounds for reference. The fabric is airy and light, so you'll need to wear neutral underwear color or they'll show. There is no tummy control if that is a concern to you. The dress is really beautiful and fit true to size. You would have to hand wash this due to the delicate fabric. Read more
items.author: Olivia Stabler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Order you size
items.body: Quality seems good but I will be returning I am 5â€™6â€ 183lbs I listened to the reviews and ordered a size up (Large) when I should have ordered the size Amazon suggested (Medium) I literally could get away with the waist but the breast was too big traps falling off my shoulders. Other than ordering the wrong size the dress is beautiful Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hangs funny
items.body: Beautiful and great material however, it hangs funny at the waist. Is not flattering Read more
items.author: Vjinx

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Formal Sleeveless Evening Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Formal Sleeveless Evening Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Mint Green, Red, Maroon, A-navy Blue, Black, Champagne, Coral Blue, Canal Blue, Cinnamon Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
